name: Baker Hughes Company
description: Baker Hughes Company, founded in 1907, is a leading energy technology company that provides solutions for oil and gas operations worldwide. Headquartered in Houston, Texas, Baker Hughes operates in over 120 countries and is committed to advancing the energy transition through innovative technology and services. The company offers a diverse portfolio that includes oilfield services, digital solutions, and industrial technologies. With a strong focus on sustainability, Baker Hughes aims to reduce the environmental impact of energy production and enhance the efficiency of resources. Their key offerings include drilling services, pressure pumping, and completion systems, as well as advanced digital solutions that leverage data analytics to optimize operations. Baker Hughes is actively involved in the development of renewable energy technologies and carbon capture solutions, playing a crucial role in the global shift towards cleaner energy. The company's mission is to deliver better energy solutions for a sustainable future, striving to meet the evolving needs of its customers while contributing to the decarbonization of the energy sector.
